description.value:
There's a hidden code that powers the Universe and realms beyond, and by focusing your intellect, you can tap into it and see the equations.

Tradition arcane

Paradox Skill Computers

Paradox Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.NkvRoN33RbDg3fl9]{Analyze Target}; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.tVTJS07cKDA5rNgc]{Sift the Sphere}; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition}; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Translocate}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.CptKtBneM7od45nc]{Subjective Reality}; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight}; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rsZ5c0AUyywe5yoK]{Retrocognition}; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wfleiawxsfhpRRwf]{Disappearance}; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight}

Warp Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.KOkGLXwOBAIlczzk]{Warp Probability}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.vL7w8EtvZHlgRKlo]{Alternate Outcome}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.v8JA4sG2tsVP2gOM]{Quantum Analysis}

Quantum Field When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, you can apply the result against two related creatures, hazards, unattended objects, and effects in your quantum field. Whenever you Sustain your quantum field, you can Seek or Recall Knowledge against a target in your quantum field as a free action.
